channel.title: Can someone make this command loop?

item.title: Can someone make this command loop?
item.dc:creator: @redstorm3265 redstorm3265
item.description:
@redstorm3265 wrote:

I want to make this command loop but delay between relooping by 2 seconds
then could someone please make one that stops the loop for the same command but command=“back”

Code:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“afk”) && playerRights >= 0) {
stillgfx(277, absY, absX);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make this command loop?
